channel.title: Nexus RSPS - Prime Edition - Exclusive Server 24/7 Dedicated w/ FibreOP
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]Want to try a new experience in Runescape private servers? [/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=12pt]Welcome to NeXus RSPS, a whole new series of dedicate servers to provide you with a solid, reliable gameplay and experience. [/size][/center]
[center][img]http://nexusrs.tk/images/banner-logo.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Features: [/b][/u] -Nex -Corp -GWD -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen -All skills available -Max cape rewarded when maxed -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items -Lots of commands for each rank -Shops replace GE, but GE is still available for those who want it -Home is Mos Le Harmless. -Few Custom Items -Prestige system (sorted shops) -Custom Clothes Changer -Custom Clothes Colour Changer -Full Summoning obelisk -Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE) -Custom emote commands[/center]
[center][size=36pt][url=http://"http://nexusrs.tk/]PLAY NOW[/url][/size][/center] [center][img]http://nexusrs.tk/images/main-1.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://nexusrs.tk/images/main-2.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://nexusrs.tk/images/main-3.gif[/img][/center] [center][size=36pt][url=http://"http://nexusrs.tk/]PLAY NOW[/url][/size][/center] [center]Visit us at [url=http://"http://nexusrs.tk/]neXusRS.tk[/url] today to join free![/center]

item.title: Nexus RSPS - Prime Edition - Exclusive Server 24/7 Dedicated w/ FibreOP
item.dc:creator: @nexusprime nexusprime
item.description:
@nexusprime wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Want to try a new experience in Runescape private servers? [/size][/center]

[center][size=12pt]Welcome to NeXus RSPS, a whole new series of dedicate servers to provide you with a solid, reliable gameplay and experience. [/size][/center]

[center][/center]

[center]Features:

-Nex
-Corp
-GWD
-Tormented Demons
-Evil Chickens
Safe pvp
-Clan wars (safe/dangerous)
-Death Match Arena
-Wilderness Pking
-Steel Kiwi Boss
-Nomad
-DKS
-Lucien
-Ice titans
-Sea Troll Queen
-All skills available
-Max cape rewarded when maxed
-Donator skilling zone
-Skilling benefits
-Donator Only Items
-Lots of commands for each rank
-Shops replace GE, but GE is still available for those who want it
-Home is Mos Le Harmless.
-Few Custom Items
-Prestige system (sorted shops)
-Custom Clothes Changer
-Custom Clothes Colour Changer
-Full Summoning obelisk
-Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE)
-Custom emote commands[/center]

[center][size=36pt]PLAY NOW[/size][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][size=36pt]PLAY NOW[/size][/center]
[center]Visit us at neXusRS.tk today to join free![/center]
